description: Episode of Series "Fit to Be You". Explains the relationship of body mass to body fat in maintaining proper body composition and the importance of keeping that well-composed body flexible through the burning of calories. A witty animated sequence shows the interrelationship of individual basal metabolism, calorie intake and the maintenance of a balanced diet.
